alert.note: Alert for Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 16 at 8:07PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Indian River. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 807 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sebastian, Fellsmere, Sebastian Highlands, Wabasso, Roseland, Winter Beach and Vero Lake Estates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
